Posted By: zeyette (12/20/2009 8:21:46 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I was playing a friend with my casual sliver deck. I had just played a kicked [Rite of Replication](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rite of Replication )  on my [Might Sliver](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Might Sliver), so I had 18 unblockable, double striking, lifelinking, shrouded, etc. 15/15 creatures. On the next turn, he played this card. I couldn't believe my eyes. I looked at the card, read it over a couple of times, and scooped. How could a couple of comparatively vanilla 15/15's stand up to this? Plus, it rhymed. "Descending" and "unending?" How cool is that?  
  
I was an instant convert. The next day, I made a mono blue deck with 56 islands and a playset of these as the only win condition. I took it to a local tournament and showed it off to a couple of people there ("LOOK AT THIS AND WEEP!!!!"). Based on the nervous laughter and expressions of disbelief ("Is this some sort of sick joke?") that I got, I could tell that they were terrified of the sheer power of the storm crow.  
  
Also, I know that there are a lot of haters out t... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

"Descending" and "unending?" How cool is that?

I was an instant convert. The next day, I made a mono blue deck with 56 islands and a playset of these as the only win condition. I took it to a local tournament and showed it off to a couple of people there ("LOOK AT THIS AND WEEP!!!!"). Based on the nervous laughter and expressions of disbelief ("Is this some sort of sick joke?") that I got, I could tell that they were terrified of the sheer power of the storm crow.

posts.post_content:
Turn 1: Land, [Elvish Spirit Guide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elvish Spirit Guide), [Lotus Cobra](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lotus Cobra)  
Turn 2: Land, [Survival of the Fittest](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Survival of the Fittest), [Confessor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Confessor)  
Turn 3: Land, [Dark Ritual](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Ritual), [Sanguine Bond](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sanguine Bond)  
/1 Mana, discard Storm Crow, fetch Storm Crow. Repeat.  
  
If this isn't proof of Storm Crows awesome power I don't know what is!!

I just had a frightening thought.
